# `Label` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| name | `string` | Yes | Name of the label |
| value | `string` | Yes | Value of the label |
| encoded | `boolean` | Yes | Whether the label is encoded or not |
